alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 01 at 9:21AM EDT until October 05 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. .Heavy rainfall over the last few days will cause the river to climb into Minor Flood stage later today. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River at Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Access roads to river acres become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 11.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 08/09/2001. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 10.9 Sun 8 am 11.2 11.3 11.2 10.9 10.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 1230 AM EDT.
